Title: A Worthy Challenge: Flameweaver Koegler
Description: $n, I need you to assemble a cunning group and venture forth into the depths of Scarlet Halls. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and put a stop to Flameweaver Koegler's book-burning ways.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Scarlet Halls Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Scarlet Halls Challenge Mode
